original_context: Sariah does not map the terrain.
Sariah does not inspire a new generation of scientists.
If Sariah either collects samples or maps terrain (but not both), then she monitors her habitat.
If Sariah either monitors habitat or tracks migrations (but not both), then she observes behavior.
If a marine biologist observes behavior and explores lineage, then they publish findings.
If Sariah either tracks migration or understands ecosystems (but not both), then she identifies patterns.
Every marine biologist who examines oceans either understands ecosystems or investigates species.
If Sariah either investigates species or explores lineage (but not both), then she researches evolution.
Sariah either analyzes data or examines fossils.
If Sariah examines fossils and researches evolution, then she studies vertebrates.
If Sariah studies vertebrates, then she either makes groundbreaking discoveries or inspires a new generation of scientists, but not both.
conclusion: Sariah does not make groundbreaking discoveries.
